quote: Always try to be a little kinder than necessary. – James Matthew Barrie
fact: Mosquito repellents don`t repel. They hide you. The spray blocks the mosquito`s sensors so they don`t know you`re there.
joke: This morning I was wondering where the sun was, but then it dawned on me.
